scripts.get-test: k6 run -e HOST=http://localhost:5000 -e VUS=1 -e ITERATIONS=100 -e CLIENT_SECRET=test dist/get.test.js
scripts.post-with-authentication: k6 run -e HOST=http://localhost:5000 -e VUS=1 -e ITERATIONS=100 -e CLIENT_SECRET=test dist/post.with.authentication.test.js
scripts.post-without-authentication: k6 run -e HOST=http://localhost:5000 -e VUS=1 -e ITERATIONS=100 dist/post.without.authentication.test.js
scripts.start: webpack && npm run get-test && npm run post-with-authentication && npm run post-without-authentication
